column4: when i go into ubuntu software center and other pages, i visualize white letters on light green background..so i cant almost read whats on the page...who knows how to get it readable??
interesting bug.  I haven't seen it before.  You might want to mention your ubuntu version.  Check http://bugs.ubuntu.com for something similar
what colours do u see on ubuntu software center!? about letters and background
they are.  I just prefer using the terminal.  There's nothing wrong with software center
did you install some themes maybe?  Does it happen with any other program?
i previously tried to install 3d graphic tweaks but they didnt work,  in fact i cant even run 3d programs...but aside that, didnt install any theme
k, well I don't know about your issue.  Check http://bugs.ubuntu.com for something similar while you wait for someone else to come along that can help you
ok! thank u very much for the advice...its a very strange bug though isn it?
yes...  Though there was some nvidia-related bug where everyone showed up blue (like smurfs).  That one is pretty weird too :P
could be possible that theres something uncompatible with my graphic card and ubuntustudio??
I have no idea to be honest
maybe create a new user and see if it happens there.  If what's important?
